name: TVContentItem
desc: An object that describes either a piece of content or a container for other content items.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

items.name: var contentIdentifier: TVContentIdentifier
items.desc: The content identifier that uniquely identifies this item.

items.name: var badgeCount: NSNumber?
items.desc: A badging integer for this item.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The localized string title of the item.

items.name: var topShelfItems: [TVContentItem]?
items.desc: An array of content items that are the items of a section.

items.name: var imageURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL giving the location of the image to be displayed for this content item.

items.name: func imageURL(forTraits: TVContentItemImageTrait) -> URL?
items.desc: Retrieve the URL for the image that best matches the specified traits.

items.name: struct TVContentItemImageTrait
items.desc: Traits describing the type of image you want.

items.name: var creationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date when the content item was created, or the date when it was first broadcast, or some other kind of origination date.

items.name: var duration: NSNumber?
items.desc: The amount of time required to play the media to completion.

items.name: var expirationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date when the user will no longer be able to access the item.

items.name: var imageShape: TVContentItemImageShape
items.desc: The intended aspect ratio or shape of the content image.

items.name: enum TVContentItemImageShape
items.desc: An enumerated type that identifies the shape in which the content item should be displayed.

items.name: var currentPosition: NSNumber?
items.desc: The index location, measured in seconds, at which the user last played this item.

items.name: var hasPlayedToEnd: NSNumber?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the user can be considered to have finished this item.

items.name: var lastAccessedDate: Date?
items.desc: The date when the user last accessed this item.

items.name: var displayURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL that causes the app which created this content item to display a description screen for the item.

items.name: var playURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL that causes the app which created this content item to begin playing the item at the user's current position.
